org.apache.karaf.profile.assembly

Class Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.karaf.profile.assembly.Builder

  • public class Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder-like class to create instances of profiles.

      • useReferenceUrls

        public Builder useReferenceUrls()
        Configure builder to generate reference:-like URIs in ${karaf.etc}/startup.properties. Bundles declared in this way are not copied (by Felix) to data/cache directory, but are used from original location.
        Returns:

      • setFeaturesProcessing

        public Builder setFeaturesProcessing(java.nio.file.Path featuresProcessing)

        Configures custom location for a file with features processing instructions. Normally this file is generated by the builder if any of blacklisted options are configured.

        If custom location is provided and it's not etc/org.apache.karaf.features.xml, it is copied

        If custom location is provided and it's etc/org.apache.karaf.features.xml, it's left as is

        Any additional blacklisting/overrides configuration via Maven configuration causes overwrite of original content.

        Parameters:
        featuresProcessing -

      • ignoreDependencyFlag

        public Builder ignoreDependencyFlag()
        Ignore the dependency attribute (dependency="[true|false]") on bundles, effectively forcing their installation.
